explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions the use of intelligent learning techniques such as artificial neural networks, which are a part of machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper discusses the use of classification and regression trees, which are supervised learning techniques.
explanations.classification: The paper explicitly mentions the use of classification techniques as part of the inferential techniques applied.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions stepwise regression and regression trees as part of the techniques used.
explanations.decision tree: The paper refers to classification and regression trees (CART), which are decision tree-based methods.
explanations.neural network: The paper specifically mentions the use of artificial neural networks as one of the intelligent learning techniques applied.
